      • addAllBytes

        private byte[] addAllBytes(byte[] a,
                           byte[] b)
        Byte array concatenation function for utility
        Parameters:
        a - original byte array.
        b - byte array that gets appended to a.
        Returns:
        a byte array containing the values of b appended to a.

      • encodeFile

        public byte[] encodeFile(byte[] data,
                         String key)
        Public callable function for performing encryption of file
        Parameters:
        data - byte array to encrypt.
        key - input String to be used as a key.
        Returns:
        encrypted byte array.

      • extendKey

        private byte[] extendKey(byte[] key,
                         int length)
        Extends the key so that it can properly encrypt the inputfile. While the key length is less than the file length (in bytes) this function repeatedly adds the hash of the current key to the key using SHA-256 and then rehashes the key again. Uses the addAllBytes function to concat the byte arrays of the key and the hash of the key.
        Parameters:
        key - input key that gets extended.
        length - the length of the file.
        Returns:
        a byte array containing the extended key.

      • getExtension

        public String getExtension(byte[] data,
                           int length)
        Retrieves the file extension based on the length previously retrieved from the decrypted file.
        Parameters:
        data - byte array containing a file extension at the end.
        length - the length of the file extension excluding the four bytes allocated for the length itself.
        Returns:
        a String containing the file extension.

      • getExtensionLength

        public int getExtensionLength(byte[] data)
        Retrieves the length of the file extension from the decrypted file to make retrieval of file extension possible.
        Parameters:
        data - byte array to retrieve extension length from.
        Returns:
        the length of the extension.

      • loadFile

        public byte[] loadFile(File input)
        Load file function, returns a byte array or exits if file is not found.
        Parameters:
        input - File to try to load.
        Returns:
        the loaded File as a byte array.

      • printBytes

        public void printBytes(byte[] a)
        Utility function that prints out a byte array as binary.
        Parameters:
        a - the byte array to print out.

      • removeLastXBytes

        public byte[] removeLastXBytes(byte[] a,
                               int x)
        Remove the last specified bytes of an array. Utility function for hiding the file extension in the encrypted file.
        Parameters:
        a - the byte array to remove x bytes from.
        x - an int containing the amount of bytes to remove.
        Returns:
        the byte array without the last x bytes.

      • setExtension

        public byte[] setExtension(byte[] data,
                           String extension)
        Adds the file exetension of the input file to the end of the output file before encryption. Allocates four bytes for the length of the extension plus the length of the extension in bytes. See the ByteBuffer class for easy handling of byte array and reallocation of memory.
        Parameters:
        data - byte array to append extension to.
        extension - extension to append to byte array.
        Returns:
        byte array with the specified extension as well as the length of that extension at the end.
        See Also:
        ByteBuffer

      • writeToFile

        public void writeToFile(byte[] data,
                        String outpath)
                 throws IOException
        Writes byte array to the specified path.
        Parameters:
        data - byte array to write.
        outpath - the path to write the File to as a String.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • xorWithKey

        private byte[] xorWithKey(byte[] value,
                          byte[] key)
        Applies the XOR operator to a byte array and a specified key. Calls EncryptionAlgorithm.extendKey at start to make sure that key length is sufficient.
        Parameters:
        value - the byte array to XOR.
        key - the byte array to XOR value with.
        Returns:
        the byte array that is the result of applying the XOR operator to value with key.
